name: Real the hero
description:
The citizens in Real Kingdom live happily every day. But you, whose name is Real, know that that is not real. What the citizens believe are fictional and imaginary. In order to save the Real Kingdom, you are going to defeat Liar the demon.

It is not real

This is a text-based adventure game. In certain statement, you need to determine is that real or not, so as to reach Liar the demon and defeat him.

Background

Due to Liar the demon, the citizens in Real Kingdom are being enchanted and everyone believes imaginary and fictional things. They believe the demon living in the forest is good, the kingdom king is evil. You, whose name is Real, is going to defeat Liar the demon, so you can save the villager, bring them back a normal life.
